roleset.name: to bring out certain features

example.name: accent-v: BNC example
example.text: It's natural that Yuri should so enjoy dressing down , when for some much of his life he has been zipped into elaborate Bolshoi costumes, [his cheekbones and eyes]-1 accented *trace*-1 by thick, expertly applied theatrical make-up.
example.arg: by thick, expertly applied theatrical make-up.

example.name: accent-v: made up
example.text: They accented the new dining area with throw pillows of a ghastly turquoise hue.
example.arg: with throw pillows of a ghastly turquoise hue.

roleset.note: ACCENT-V NOTES: No VNcls. No FNcls. (from accent.01-v)
